recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti; brown beef with onions and garlic; add tomato sauce; simmer and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry chicken and vegetables in a wok; add soy sauce and ginger; serve over rice.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella; arrange with basil leaves; drizzle with balsamic and olive oil.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.instructions: Saute onions and bell peppers; add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder; simmer until flavors meld.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.instructions: Marinate salmon in olive oil, lemon, dill, salt, and pepper; grill until cooked through.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.instructions: Saute onions and mushrooms; add rice and gradually stir in broth; finish with parmesan.

recipes.name: Taco Salad
recipes.instructions: Brown beef with taco seasoning; assemble salad with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta; toss with basil pesto; add halved cherry tomatoes and grated parmesan.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Buffalo Wings
recipes.instructions: Dip cauliflower in batter; bake until crispy; toss in buffalo sauce; serve with ranch dressing.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.instructions: Saute shrimp and garlic; deglaze with white wine; toss with cooked linguine, lemon, and parsley.
